about_the_game:
It's New Year's Eve 1997 and, like every year, Lani, Collin & Tiho are playing a video game that is on an unlabeled cartridge. But this year something strange happens and they are taken into a twisted fantasy world. The cartridge seems to contain not only the addictive game, but also a dark secret.

  • 3 playable main characters

  • classic point and click gameplay

  • story based, funny, full of fantasy

  • hand drawn and hand animated

  • solo developed

Hey guys!

I'm Christoph - the developer of "A Pretty Broken Adventure".

After my debut game "Cleo - a pirate's tale" this is my second point and click adventure game.

The development is still in the early stages, but I am very happy to finally announce this new project to you. I would like to share the journey with you and that's why I publish a detailed devlog video at the first of every month. So let's start the journey to A PRETTY BROKEN ADVENTURE together!
